data.name: evAurora0
data.value:
YOU DISCOVER THE {0}{1} BOREALIS, A UNIQUE CELESTIAL PHENOMENA.
"DON'T STARE AT IT TOO LONG, CAPT'N. YOU'LL GET SPACE MADNESS."

data.name: evAurora0ContinueStaring
data.value: CONTINUE STARING.

data.name: evAurora0StopStaring
data.value: STOP STARING.

data.name: evAurora1Staring
data.value:
YOU GAZE INTO THE SWIRLING HORROR.
HOURS LATER, YOU SCREAM AWAKE IN THE OPPOSITE END OF THE SHIP.
HOW DID YOU END UP HERE? AND WHO TOOK YOUR PANTS?

data.name: evHitchhikerRevenge0
data.value:
YOU WAKE UP TO SEE GUNS POINTED AT YOU. IT'S THE HITCHHIKERS YOU BETRAYED.
"HEY BOJO. REMEMBER US? GIVE US ALL YOUR CARGO AND WE'LL BE LEAVING, REAL QUIET-LIKE."

data.name: evHitchhikerRevenge0Fight
data.value: FIGHT BACK.

data.name: evHitchhikerRevenge0GiveCargo
data.value: GIVE THEM ALL YOUR CARGO.

data.name: evHitchhikerRevenge1GiveUp
data.value:
YOU GIVE THE HITCHHIKERS ALL YOUR CARGO.
"THAT'LL TEACH YA, BOJO!"

data.name: evHitchhikerRevenge1Struggle
data.value:
YOU STRIKE BACK. DURING THE FIGHT, YOU LOSE AN EYE.
THE HITCHHIKERS RETREAT TO THEIR SHIPS. THE BATTLE BEGINS.

data.name: evHitchhikers0
data.value:
SPACE HITCHHIKERS HAIL A RIDE.
"GIVE US A LIFT?"

data.name: evHitchhikers0No
data.value: DECLINE.

data.name: evHitchhikers0Yes
data.value: PICK UP THE HITCHHIKERS.

data.name: evHitchhikers1Chat
data.value:
"THANKS FOR THE RIDE. IT'S FREEZING OUT THERE."
THE HITCHHIKERS DELICATELY BRING ABOARD A LARGE PIECE OF CARGO. IT LOOKS VALUABLE.

data.name: evHitchHikers1ChatLeave
data.value: PLAY BOARDGAMES.

data.name: evHitchHikers1ChatSteal
data.value: STEAL THEIR CARGO.

data.name: evHitchHikers2StealCargo
data.value:
A STRUGGLE ENSUES. THE HITCHHIKERS MAKE A DARING ESCAPE.
"YOU'LL REGRET THAT, BOJO!"

data.name: evSpaceHulk0
data.value:
YOUR SALVAGE CREW EXPLORES THE "{0} {1}," A DERELICT WARSHIP.
"CAPT'N, WE HEAR... SOMETHING. SOUNDS LIKE A CRYING CHILD OR A HOWLING DOG."

data.name: evSpaceHulk0Investigate
data.value: CONTINUE EXPLORING.

data.name: evSpaceHulk0Leave
data.value: LEAVE IMMEDIATELY.

data.name: evSpaceHulk1Bruja
data.value:
AFTER HOURS OF EXPLORATION, THE SALVAGE CREW RETURNS.
THEY RETURN CATATONIC AND COVERED IN LACERATIONS. THEY NEVER SPEAK ANOTHER WORD.

data.name: evSpaceHulk1BrujaLost
data.value:
THE SALVAGE CREW CONTINUES EXPLORING.
"THE BRUJA! THE BRU-"
THE RADIO CUTS OUT AND THEY ARE NEVER HEARD FROM AGAIN.

data.name: evSpaceHulk1Cargo
data.value:
THE SALVAGE CREW RETURNS WITH CARGO.
"CAPT'N, WE FOUND SALVAGE.
LET'S GET OUTTA HERE. THAT SHIP GIVES ME THE HEEBIE JEEBIES."

data.name: startBattle
data.value: START BATTLE

data.name: evBandits0
data.value:
YOU ARE AMBUSHED BY A BANDIT SUFFERING FROM SPACE MADNESS.
"I TOLD THEM TO SHOOT, BUT THEY DIDN'T BELIEVE ME!"

data.name: evRuins0
data.value:
WHILE EXPLORING ANCIENT RUINS, YOU ENCOUNTER CATS ON THE RUN FROM THE AUTHORITIES.
"HELLO FRIEND. I AND ME BRETHREN NEED YOUR HELP."

data.name: evRuins0Help
data.value: HELP THE CATS ESCAPE.

data.name: evRuins0Turnin
data.value: TURN THEM IN TO THE AUTHORITIES.

data.name: evRuins1Help
data.value:
AN INTENSE CHASE ENSUES. YOU AND THE CATS ESCAPE THE AUTHORITIES.
CHU-CHU MEOWS A SIGH OF RELIEF. "MUCH LOVE, MUCH RESPECT. WE SHARE OUR LOOT."

data.name: evRuins1Turnin
data.value:
THE AUTHORITIES DRAG THE CATS AWAY.
"WHERE'S THE LOVE, FRIEND?"

data.name: evDeer0
data.value:
"HALT, INCOMING FLOTILLA. YOU PLEBS ARE ENCROACHING ROYAL CERVIDIAN SPACE.
PAY A TOLL OF ONE CARGO PIECE."

data.name: evDeer0Pay
data.value: PAY THE FEE.

data.name: evDeer0Refuse
data.value: REFUSE TO PAY.

data.name: evDeer1Fight
data.value:
THE DEER LICKS HIS LIPS.
"I WAS HOPING YOU'D SAY THAT, PLEB."

data.name: evDeer1Pay
evDeer1PayNoCargo
data.value:
"APPARENTLY YOU HAVE NO CARGO.
GET OUT OF MY SIGHT, PLEB."

data.name: evDeerRevenge0
data.value:
"FOUND YOU AT LAST.
DID YOU THINK YOU COULD DESTROY MY DEER BROTHERS WITHOUT CONSEQUENCE?
PREPARE TO REAP THE WHIRLWIND."

data.name: evStorm0
data.value:
YOUR FLOTILLA IS CAUGHT IN AN ELECTRICAL STORM.
"HELLO FRIENDS. MUCH RESPECT FOR HELPING US WITH THE AUTHORITIES A WHILE AGO.
WHO LOVES YA? I DO."

data.name: evStorm0Thanks
data.value: THANK YOU, CATS.

data.name: evStorm1
data.value:
THE CATS HELP YOU WEATHER THE STORM.
"WE LEAVE NOW, WE LEAVE A GIFT FOR YOU."

data.name: evStorm1Thanks
data.value: MUCH RESPECT, CATS.

data.name: evCatCharity0
data.value:
"ME BRETHREN HEARD OF YOUR RUN-IN WITH THE DEER. THEY TOOK YOUR CARGO! SCOUNDRELS!
TAKE THIS, AND SHOW THEM A THING OR TWO."

data.name: evPrisoner0
data.value:
YOU ARE DETAINED BY CERVIDIAN FORCES.
"YOU AIDED AND ABETTED TWO FUGITIVE CATS. TELL US THEIR LOCATION."

data.name: evPrisoner0GiveUp
data.value: GIVE THE CATS' LOCATION.

data.name: evPrisoner0StaySilent
data.value: REMAIN SILENT.

data.name: evPrisoner1GiveUp
data.value:
YOU GIVE THEM THE CATS' LOCATION.
"GOOD. WE'LL BE KEEPING A CLOSE EYE ON THOSE CATS."

data.name: evPrisoner1Silence
data.value:
"THAT'S HOW YOU WANT TO PLAY IT?"
DURING THE BRUTAL BEATING, YOU LOSE A LEG.

data.name: evProfessors0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER "THE CRISIUM," A GROUP OF XENOARCHAEOLOGISTS.
"WE'D LIKE TO HIRE YOUR SERVICES. WHAT PAYMENT WOULD YOU PREFER?"

data.name: evProfessors0Cargo
data.value: GIVE ME CARGO.

data.name: evProfessors0Ship
data.value: ADD SHIP TO MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: evAbandoned0
data.value:
DEEP IN A SPACE DERELICT, YOU DISCOVER COLONISTS COCOONED IN THE WALLS. THEY SCREAM.
"THE BRUJA... THE BRUJA DID THIS.
PLEASE... PLEASE KILL US."

data.name: evAbandoned0CleanShip
data.value: DESTROY THE DERELICT.

data.name: evAbandoned0Leave
data.value: WAIT FOR A CURE.

data.name: evAbandoned1GrueEat
data.value:
YOU PLANT THE TIMED VULCAN CHARGES.
THE EXPLOSION IS DEVASTATING.

data.name: evAssassin0
data.value:
THE ASSASSIN'S MISSILE SMASHES INTO YOUR SHIP.
"FOUND YOU, {0}.
TELL THEM TO KISS THE NIGHT MOTHER."

data.name: evSlavers0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A FLOTILLA OF SLAVETRADERS.
"YOU DIDN'T SEE NOTHING. HERE'S A LITTLE HAIR OFF THE DOG.
NOW SCRAM."

data.name: evSlavers0Accept
data.value: ACCEPT BRIBE AND LEAVE.

data.name: evSlavers0Fight
data.value: FIGHT THE SLAVETRADERS.

data.name: evStowaways0
data.value:
YOU DISCOVER TOUCAN STOWAWAYS IN THE CARGO HOLD. THEY GLOW DANGEROUSLY.
"DON'T SHOOT! WE CAN LEAD YOU TO... HIDDEN TREASURE."
YOU SUSPECT THEY ARE FUGITIVES ON THE RUN.

data.name: evStowaways0LetLive
data.value: LET THEM STAY.

data.name: evStowaways0Shoot
data.value: EJECT THEM INTO AIRLOCK.

data.name: evStowaways1Live
data.value:
THE TOUCANS GIVE YOU A TATTERED CLOTH MAP.
"PHEW, I THOUGHT WE WERE DONE FOR."

data.name: evStowaways1Shoot
data.value:
THE AIRLOCK SLAMS OPEN. THE TOUCANS DISAPPEAR INTO THE INKY VOID.
YOU SEARCH THEIR BELONGINGS.

data.name: evDeerBruja0
data.value:
"HALT, INCOMING FLOTILLA.
OUR SCANS INDICATE A SHIP IN YOUR FLOTILLA HAS BEEN TAINTED BY A BRUJA. UNDER CERVIDIAN EDICT MXCVII, WE MUST ENACT QUARANTINE PROTOCOL.
WE WILL NOW ADMINISTER THE CLEANSING FIRE."

data.name: evHitchhikerDrop0
data.value:
YOUR HITCHHIKER PASSENGERS TAKE LEAVE.
"THANKS FOR THE RIDE. SEE Y'ALL LATER!"

data.name: evAuroraResearchBad0
data.value:
YOU TELL THE CRISIUM XENOARCHEOLOGISTS ABOUT THE AURORA.
"GOOD HEAVENS! AN AURORA!
NEXT TIME, STARE STRAIGHT INTO THE AURORA. WE'D BE VERY INTERESTED TO SEE WHAT HAPPENS."

data.name: evAuroraResearchGood0
data.value:
YOU TELL THE CRISIUM XENOARCHEOLOGISTS ABOUT THE AURORA.
"GOOD HEAVENS! YOU STARED RIGHT INTO THE AURORA?"

data.name: evAuroraResearchGood0Indeed
data.value: INDEED.

data.name: evAuroraResearchGood1Study
data.value:
THE XENOARCHEOLOGISTS RUN SOME TESTS ON YOU.
"THIS HAS BEEN A MOST FRUITFUL FIND.
PLEASE TAKE THIS AS COMPENSATION."

data.name: evAbandonZombies0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A PLANETARY ZOMBIE OUTBREAK.
A FAMILIAR-LOOKING STARSHIP LIES SMOLDERING AT THE OUTBREAK'S POINT OF ORIGIN.
"CAPT'N, LOOKS LIKE THAT DERELICT SHIP WE ENCOUNTERED EARLIER."

data.name: evAssassinRevenge0
data.value:
THE ASSASSIN FIRES A VOLLEY OF MISSILES.
"I HAVE NO QUARREL WITH YOU, {0}. I JUST WANT YOUR STOWAWAYS - THOSE TWO GLOWING TOUCANS.
HAND THEM OVER, AND I'LL PAY YOU HANDSOMELY."

data.name: evAssassinRevenge0DenyToucans
data.value: FIGHT THE ASSASSIN.

data.name: evAssassinRevenge0GiveToucans
data.value: GIVE HER THE TOUCANS.

data.name: evAssassinRevenge1GiveToucans
data.value:
AGAINST THEIR WISHES, YOU GIVE THE TOUCANS TO THE ASSASSIN.
"NOW THAT WASN'T SO HARD, WAS IT?"

data.name: evToucanRevenge0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER TWO FAMILIAR GLOWING TOUCANS.
"LOOK WHAT WE HAVE HERE - A SPACE CAPTAIN WHO FANCIES LAUNCHING TOUCANS OUT OF AIRLOCKS! REMEMBER US?
WE'RE GONNA END YOU."

data.name: evPirates0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER FOWL SPACE PIRATES.
"NICE FLOTILLA YOU GOT THERE. I THINK WE'LL TAKE IT."

data.name: evHippoBuddy0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A HIPPO.
"I HEARD YOU TOOK OUT TWO CERDIVIAN FLEETS. IF YOU'RE GOING TO HELL, I'M COMING WITH YA.
I WANT TO JOIN YOUR FLOTILLA."

data.name: evHippoBuddy0Welcome
data.value: WELCOME ABOARD!

data.name: evPirateHostage0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER PIRATES.
"HAND OVER SOME CARGO, AND WE'LL BE ON OUR WAY.
AND BEFORE YOU GO A-BLASTIN', KNOW THAT WE HAVE CIVILIAN HOSTAGES ONBOARD."

data.name: evPirateHostage0Attack
data.value: ATTACK THE PIRATES.

data.name: evPirateHostage0GiveCargo
data.value: GIVE THEM CARGO.

data.name: evPirateHostage1GiveCargo
evPirateHostage1NoCargo
data.value:
"...YOU DON'T HAVE ANY CARGO?
PREPARE TO EAT SPACE DUST."

data.name: evHippoPirateBuddy
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A HIPPO.
"I SAW HOW YOU TOOK OUT THOSE PIRATES.
THOSE PIRATES TOOK MY LEGS. IT'S ABOUT TIME I GET THEM BACK.
I WANT TO JOIN YOUR FLOTILLA."

data.name: evBabyYetis0
data.value:
YOU FIND BABY YETIS CHEWING YOUR ELECTRICAL CONDUITS.
YOUR NAVIGATION OFFICER IS DISTRAUGHT.
"CAPT'N, I'M SO SORRY. I DON'T KNOW HOW THEY ESCAPED FROM MY QUARTERS."

data.name: evBabyYetis0Airlock
data.value: THROW THE YETIS OUT THE AIRLOCK.

data.name: evBabyYetis0Declaw
data.value: DE-CLAW AND DE-FANG THE YETIS.

data.name: evBabyYetis1Airlock
data.value:
YOU LAUNCH THE BABY YETIS OUT OF THE AIRLOCK.
"CAPT'N!"
YOUR NAVIGATION OFFICER BOARDS A SHUTTLE AND LEAVES.

data.name: evBabyYetis1Declaw
data.value:
YOU DE-CLAW AND DE-FANG THE YETIS.
THE YETIS GROW RESENTFUL AND BITTER.

data.name: evImplementors0
data.value:
YOU DREAM. THE IMPLEMENTORS APPEAR.
"You're a child playing with friends. Your mother calls you in.
What do you do?"

data.name: evImplementors0Obey
data.value: OBEY HER IMMEDIATELY.

data.name: evImplementors0Defy
data.value: DEFY HER. CONTINUE PLAYING.

data.name: evYetiResentment0
data.value:
YOUR NAV OFFICER'S PET YETIS GIVE YOU THE EVIL EYE. THEY ARE RESENTFUL THAT YOU DE-CLAWED AND DE-FANGED THEM.
"DON'T WORRY, CAPT'N. I'M SURE IT'S JUST A PHASE."

data.name: evYetiResentment0Ok
data.value: YEAH, IT BETTER BE.

data.name: evMurder0
data.value:
A DIPLOMAT IS KILLED. YOUR WEAPONS OFFICER IS DISTRAUGHT.
"CAPT'N, YOU'VE KNOWN ME FOR TEN YEARS. THIS ISN'T MY FAULT..."

data.name: evMurder0Authorities
data.value: REPORT DEAN TO THE AUTHORITIES.

data.name: evMurder0Help
data.value: HELP DEAN BECOME A FUGITIVE.

data.name: evMurder1Authorities
data.value:
DEAN FIGHTS HIS WAY TO THE ESCAPE PODS.
YOU BLAST OFF HIS LEFT ARM, BUT HE MANAGES TO ESCAPE.

data.name: evMurder1Help
data.value:
YOU DISPOSE THE DIPLOMAT'S BODY.
"CAPT'N, YOU DON'T KNOW HOW MUCH THIS MEANS TO ME."

data.name: evYetiStarve0
data.value:
YOUR NAVIGATION OFFICER'S PET YETIS RUIN YOUR FOOD STORES.
"WE'LL HAVE TO RATION THE REMAINING FOOD STORES. WHO GETS PRIORITY?"

data.name: evYetiStarve0Elderly
data.value: GIVE FOOD TO THE ELDERLY.

data.name: evYetiStarve0Young
data.value: GIVE FOOD TO THE YOUTH.

data.name: evYetiStarve1Elderly
data.value:
YOU GIVE FOOD PRIORITY TO THE ELDERLY.
THE CHILDREN GROW SICK AND WEAK.
ANTI-YETI SENTIMENT GROWS STRONGER.

data.name: evYetiStarve1Young
data.value:
YOU GIVE FOOD PRIORITY TO THE YOUTH.
THE ELDERLY GROW FEEBLE. MANY PERISH.
ANTI-YETI SENTIMENT GROWS STRONGER.

data.name: evCasino0
data.value:
YOUR SCIENCE OFFICER'S BIRTHDAY IS SPENT AT THE TANGERIN GAMBLING RESORT.
HOURS LATER IN A DRUNKEN STUPOR, YOU REALIZE YOU'VE GAMBLED AWAY YOUR ENTIRE FLOTILLA.

data.name: evCasino0UhOh
data.value: OH NO!

data.name: evCasino1
data.value:
THE CASINO PRESIDENT OFFERS A PROPOSAL.
"I CAN FOREGO YOUR DEBT IF YOU AGREE TO PERFORM CERTAIN... SERVICES FOR OUR CASINO."

data.name: evCasino1Agree
data.value: ACCEPT THE OFFER.

data.name: evCasino1Disagree
data.value: FIGHT YOUR WAY OUT.

data.name: evCasino2Agree
data.value:
YOU ACCEPT THE OFFER.
"VERY GOOD. WE'LL BE CONTACTING YOU AGAIN SHORTLY."

data.name: evCasino2Disagree
data.value:
YOU REFUSE THE OFFER.
THREE HOURS AND 3000 BULLETS LATER, YOU AND YOUR CREW ESCAPE THE CASINO.

data.name: evImplementorsMurder0
data.value:
YOU DREAM. THE IMPLEMENTORS APPEAR.
"A close friend commits a crime. What do you do?"

data.name: evImplementorsMurder0Authorities
data.value: REPORT FRIEND TO AUTHORITIES.

data.name: evImplementorsMurder0Help
data.value: HELP COVER UP THE CRIME.

data.name: evKatanaShip0
data.value:
"CAPT'N, WE FOUND A FRIGATE FROM THE LOST CRUCES FLEET. WE COULD SALVAGE IT, BUT...
I THINK IT'S HAUNTED. WE SHOULD BLOW IT UP."

data.name: evKatanaShip0Leave
data.value: DESTROY THE SHIP.

data.name: evKatanaShip0Salvage
data.value: SALVAGE THE SHIP.

data.name: evPigs0
data.value:
YOU RECEIVE A DISTRESS CALL FROM PIGS.
"WE GOT A WEE SPOT O' PIRATE TROUBLE! HELP!"
YOU RECOGNIZE THE PIGS. THEY'RE NOTORIOUS WHITE-COLLAR CRIMINALS WHO LIKELY HAVE VALUABLE CARGO.

data.name: evPigs0Help
data.value: HELP THE PIGS.

data.name: evPigs0Leave
data.value: ATTACK THE PIGS AND ROB THEM.

data.name: evPigs1Betray
data.value:
YOU OPEN FIRE ON THE PIGS.
THEIR SHIP SHATTERS INTO SPACE DUST.

data.name: evCasino2NoCargo
data.value:
"YOU HAVE NO CARGO? LOOKS LIKE YOU'LL BE WORKING FOR US AFTER ALL.
WE'LL BE IN CONTACT SHORTLY."

data.name: evPandaSlaveBuddy0
data.value:
"I WAS IN THAT SLAVE RING YOU ATTACKED EARLIER. THANKS FOR FREEING ME!
CALL ME SHABA. I'D LIKE TO JOIN YOUR FLOTILLA."

data.name: logPigsHelp
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED PIGS UNDER PIRATE ATTACK. I CHOSE TO SAVE THEM.

data.name: logPigsKill
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED PIGS UNDER PIRATE ATTACK. I CHOSE TO ATTACK THE PIGS AND ROB THEM.

data.name: logAbandonedKill
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A DERELICT WITH COCOONED COLONISTS. I DECIDED TO DESTROY THE DERELICT.

data.name: logAbandonedSave
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A DERELICT WITH COCOONED COLONISTS. I DECIDED TO LEAVE THEM ALONE.

data.name: logAbandonZombies
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A ZOMBIE OUTBREAK. IT ORIGINATED FROM THE DERELICT SHIP I ENCOUNTERED EARLIER.

data.name: logAssassin
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED AN ASSASSIN INTENT ON DESTROYING MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logAssassinRevengeFight
data.value: THE ASSASSIN FOUND ME AGAIN. I REFUSED TO GIVE HER THE TOUCANS SHE WAS HUNTING.

data.name: logAssassinRevengeGive
data.value: THE ASSASSIN FOUND ME AGAIN. I GAVE HER THE TOUCANS SHE WAS HUNTING.

data.name: logAuroraNoStare
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CELESTIAL AURORA. I CHOSE TO NOT STARE AT IT.

data.name: logAuroraResearchBad
data.value: I SPOKE TO THE CRISIUM SCIENTISTS ABOUT THE CELESTIAL AURORA. THEY WANT ME TO STARE AT IT NEXT TIME.

data.name: logAuroraResearchGood
data.value: I SPOKE TO THE CRISIUM SCIENTISTS ABOUT THE CELESTIAL AURORA. THEY WERE ENTHRALLED.

data.name: logAuroraStare
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CELESTIAL AURORA. I CHOSE TO STARE STRAIGHT INTO IT.

data.name: logBabyYetisKill
data.value: I FOUND BABY YETIS CHEWING MY POWER CONDUITS. I CHOSE TO EJECT THEM OUT THE AIRLOCK.

data.name: logBabyYetisSave
data.value: I FOUND BABY YETIS CHEWING MY POWER CONDUITS. I CHOSE TO DE-FANG AND DE-CLAW THEM.

data.name: logBandit
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HOSTILE BANDIT SICK WITH SPACE MADNESS.

data.name: logCasinoLoseCargo
data.value: I GAMBLED AWAY MY ENTIRE FLOTILLA AT A CASINO. I CHOSE TO MAKE A DARING ESCAPE AND NOW I'M ON THE RUN.

data.name: logCasinoWork
data.value: I CHOSE TO WORK FOR A CASINO TO PAY OFF MY DEBT.

data.name: logCatCharity
data.value: THE CATS HEARD ABOUT MY CERDIVIAN TOLL ROUTE INCIDENT. THEY DONATED CARGO TO ME.

data.name: logDeerBruja
data.value: CERDIVIAN FORCES SUSPECTED A SHIP IN MY FLOTILLA WAS TAINTED BY THE BRUJA. THEY ATTACKED ME.

data.name: logDeerFight
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CERDIVIAN TOLL ROUTE. I REFUSED TO PAY THE TOLL.

data.name: logDeerPay
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CERDIVIAN TOLL ROUTE. I CHOSE TO PAY THE TOLL.

data.name: logDeerRevenge
data.value: IN RETALIATION FOR MY ATTACK AT THE CERDIVIAN TOLL ROUTE, A STRIKE FORCE WAS SENT AFTER ME.

data.name: logHippoBuddy
data.value: A HIPPO HEARD I DESTROYED TWO CERDIVIAN FLEETS. THE HIPPO JOINED MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logHippoPirateBuddy
data.value: A LEGLESS HIPPO HEARD ABOUT MY FIGHT AGAINST THE PIRATES. THE HIPPO JOINED MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logHitchhikerDrop
data.value: THE HITCHHIKERS THANKED ME FOR THE RIDE AND LEFT.

data.name: logHitchhikerRevengeFight
data.value: THE HITCHHIKERS RETURNED FOR REVENGE. I REFUSED TO GIVE THEM MY CARGO AND CHOSE TO FIGHT THEM.

data.name: logHitchhikerRevengePay
data.value: THE HITCHHIKERS RETURNED FOR REVENGE. I CHOSE TO GIVE UP ALL MY CARGO.

data.name: logHitchhikersDecline
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED HITCHHIKERS. I CHOSE TO NOT PICK THEM UP.

data.name: logHitchhikersNoSteal
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED HITCHHIKERS. I CHOSE TO PICK THEM UP.

data.name: logHitchhikersSteal
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED HITCHHIKERS. I CHOSE TO STEAL THEIR CARGO.

data.name: logImplementors
data.value: I HAD A DREAM ABOUT THE IMPLEMENTORS.

data.name: logKatanaShipDestroy
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HAUNTED LOST CRUCES SHIP. I CHOSE TO DESTROY IT.

data.name: logKatanaShipSalvage
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HAUNTED LOST CRUCES SHIP. I CHOSE TO ADD IT TO MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logMurderAuthorities
data.value: I CHOSE TO REPORT MY WEAPONS OFFICER FOR THE DEATH OF A DIPLOMAT. HE MANAGED TO FLEE IN AN ESCAPE POD.

data.name: logMurderHelp
data.value: I CHOSE TO HELP MY WEAPONS OFFICER COVER UP THE DEATH OF A DIPLOMAT.

data.name: logPandaSlaveBuddy
data.value: A PANDA ESCAPED FROM THE SLAVE SHIP I ATTACKED EARLIER. THE PANDA JOINED MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logPirateHostageAttack
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED MURDEROUS CHICKEN PIRATES WITH HOSTAGES. I CHOSE TO ATTACK THEM.

data.name: logPirateHostageCargo
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED MURDEROUS CHICKEN PIRATES WITH HOSTAGES. I CHOSE TO PAY THE RANSOM.

data.name: logPirateHostageNoCargo
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED MURDEROUS CHICKEN PIRATES WITH HOSTAGES. I HAD NO RANSOM, SO THE PIRATES ATTACKED ME.

data.name: logPirates
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED MURDEROUS CHICKEN PIRATES.

data.name: logPrisonerGiveUp
data.value: I WAS INTERROGATED BY CERDIVIANS. I TOLD THEM THE CATS' LOCATION.

data.name: logPrisonerSilent
data.value: I WAS INTERROGATED BY CERDIVIANS. I REFUSED TO TELL THEM THE CATS' LOCATION.

data.name: logProfessorsItem
data.value: I WAS HIRED BY "THE CRISIUM." THEY PAID ME WITH NEW CARGO.

data.name: logProfessorsShip
data.value: I WAS HIRED BY "THE CRISIUM." THEY PAID ME WITH A NEW SHIP.

data.name: logRuinsAuthorities
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED CATS ON THE RUN. I REPORTED THEM TO THE AUTHORITIES.

data.name: logRuinsHelp
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED CATS ON THE RUN. I HELPED THEM ESCAPE.

data.name: logSlaversBribe
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED SLAVERS. I ACCEPTED THEIR BRIBE AND LEFT THEM ALONE.

data.name: logSlaversFight
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED SLAVERS. THEY TRIED TO BRIBE ME, BUT I REFUSED.

data.name: logSpacehulkBruja
data.value: I ORDERED MY CREW TO EXPLORE A DERELICT. THEY ENCOUNTERED THE BRUJA AND WERE NEVER HEARD FROM AGAIN.

data.name: logSpacehulkCargo
data.value: I ORDERED MY CREW TO EXPLORE A DERELICT. THEY RETURNED WITH CARGO.

data.name: logSpacehulkIgnore
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A DERELICT. I CHOSE TO NOT EXPLORE IT.

data.name: logStorm
data.value: MY FLOTILLA ENTERED A DEVASTATING ELECTRICAL STORM. THE CATS HELPED US WEATHER THE STORM.

data.name: logStowawayHelp
data.value: I FOUND TOUCAN STOWAWAYS. I DECIDED TO LET THEM STAY.

data.name: logStowawayKill
data.value: I FOUND TOUCAN STOWAWAYS. I EJECTED THEM FROM THE AIRLOCK.

data.name: logToucanRevenge
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED THE TOUCANS I EARLIER HAD EJECTED FROM THE AIRLOCK. THEY IMMEDIATELY ATTACKED ME.

data.name: logYetiResentment
data.value: MY NAV OFFICER'S PET YETIS ARE RESENTFUL I DE-CLAWED AND DE-FANGED THEM.

data.name: logYetiStarveOld
data.value: MY NAV OFFICER'S PET YETIS RAIDED THE FOOD STORES. I CHOSE TO GIVE THE REMAINING RATIONS TO THE ELDERLY.

data.name: logYetiStarveYouth
data.value: MY NAV OFFICER'S PET YETIS RAIDED THE FOOD STORES. I CHOSE TO GIVE THE REMAINING RATIONS TO THE YOUTHS.

data.name: evCasino2DisagreeYikes
data.value: YIKES!

data.name: evCasinoRhino0
data.value:
"THERE YOU ARE.
MY EMPLOYER, TANGERIN CASINOS, WISHES TO EXPRESS ITS SINCERE DISPLEASURE AT YOUR FAILURE TO PAY YOUR DEBT.
IT'S STRICTLY BUSINESS, PAL."

data.name: evDeerKatana0
data.value:
"HALT, INCOMING FLOTILLA.
WE'VE RECEIVED REPORTS YOU WILLFULLY COMMANDEERED A CLASS-7B DERELICT WITHOUT NOTIFYING THE PROPER AUTHORITIES.
THE PENALTY IS TOTAL ANNIHILATION."

data.name: logCasinoRhino
data.value: THE CASINO SENT A RHINO HITMAN AFTER ME.

data.name: logDeerKatana
data.value: CERDIVIAN FORCES NOTICED I COMMANDEERED A DERELICT SHIP. THEY ATTACKED ME.

data.name: evTutorial0
data.value: ARMED WITH NOTHING BUT A BONE TO PICK AND SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE, YOU EMBARK ON YOUR LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: evTutorial0OK
data.value: ONWARD GO!

data.name: evTutorial1
data.value:
"CAPT'N, YOU'RE STILL FOGGY FROM THE HIBERNATION SLEEP.
DO YOU WANT TO RUN A COMBAT TRAINING EXERCISE?"

data.name: evTutorial1RunTutorial
data.value: RUN TUTORIAL

data.name: evTutorial1SkipTutorial
data.value: SKIP TUTORIAL

data.name: logTutorial
data.value: WITH SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE, I EMBARKED ON MY LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: logTutorial1
data.value: I'M TOLD I HAVE SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE. SO BEGINS MY LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: logTutorial2
data.value: WITH NOTHING TO LOSE AND SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE, I BEGAN MY LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: logTutorial3
data.value: ARMED WITH NOTHING BUT A BONE TO PICK AND SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE, I EMBARKED ON MY LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: logTutorial4
data.value: I'M DIAGNOSED WITH SEVEN MONTHS LEFT TO LIVE. SO BEGINS MY LAST ADVENTURE.

data.name: evTerminalDeath0
data.value:
AFTER SEVEN MONTHS, YOUR TERMINAL CONDITION ENTERS ITS FINAL PHASE.
YOUR ADVENTURE COMES TO AN END.

data.name: evTerminalDeath0TheEnd
data.value: THE END

data.name: logTerminalDeath
data.value: AFTER SEVEN MONTHS, MY TERMINAL CONDITION CAUGHT UP TO ME.

data.name: evCatGuns0
data.value:
"YO. I HEARD YOU HELPED ME COUSINS ESCAPE THE LAW.
I NEED ASSISTANCE. HIDE THIS CARGO FOR ME, HEAR?"

data.name: evCatGuns0HideGuns
data.value: HIDE THE HOT CARGO.

data.name: evCatGuns0Refuse
data.value: DECLINE TO HELP.

data.name: logCatGunsHide
data.value: SOME CATS HEARD ABOUT ME. I HELPED THEM HIDE HOT CARGO ON MY SHIP.

data.name: logCatGunsRefuse
data.value: SOME CATS HEARD ABOUT ME. THEY WANTED TO HIDE HOT CARGO ON MY SHIP, BUT I REFUSED.

data.name: evJaguarBuddy0
data.value:
YOU'RE APPROACHED BY A JAGUAR MERCENARY.
"I SAW YOU POD THOSE PIGS BACK THERE. THAT WAS REAL COLD-BLOODED.
I WANT TO JOIN YOUR FLOTILLA."

data.name: evJaguarBuddy0Welcome
data.value: WELCOME ABOARD, YOU PSYCHOPATH.

data.name: evSlaverRevenge0
data.value:
YOU'RE AMBUSHED BY SLAVERS.
"YOU'RE THE ONE WHO ATTACKED US EARLIER.
WHAT HAPPENS WHEN YOU POKE THE BEAR? THIS HAPPENS."

data.name: evSwanPolice0
data.value:
YOU'RE VISITED BY A SECRET POLICE SWAN.
"WE'RE INVESTIGATING THE DEATH OF A DIPLOMAT."

data.name: evSwanPolice0Attack
data.value: ATTACK THE AGENT.

data.name: evSwanPolice0Bribe
data.value: BRIBE THE AGENT.

data.name: evSwanPolice1Bribe
data.value:
"I THINK YOU'RE MISTAKING ME FOR SOMEONE WHO TAKES BRIBES."
THE SECRET POLICE OPEN FIRE.

data.name: evYetiRevenge0
data.value:
AN ARTILLERY BARRAGE ROCKS YOUR SHIP.
"LONG TIME NO SEE, CAPT'N. MY YETIS ARE ALL GROWN UP NOW.
YOU BROUGHT THIS UPON YOURSELF!"

data.name: logJaguarBuddy
data.value: A MERCENARY JAGUAR WAS IMPRESSED WITH HOW I DESTROYED THE PIGS. THE JAGUAR JOINED MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logSlaverRevenge
data.value: I WAS AMBUSHED BY THE SLAVERS I ATTACKED EARLIER.

data.name: logSwanPoliceAttack
data.value: THE SECRET POLICE INVESTIGATED ME CONCERNING THE DIPLOMAT DEATH. I CHOSE TO ATTACK THE AGENT.

data.name: logSwanPoliceBribe
data.value: THE SECRET POLICE INVESTIGATED ME CONCERNING THE DIPLOMAT DEATH. I ATTEMPTED TO BRIBE THE AGENT.

data.name: logYetiRevenge
data.value: MY ROGUE NAV OFFICER AND HER YETIS FOUND ME. THEY ATTACKED ME ON-SIGHT.

data.name: evPigReward0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER FAMILIAR WHITE-COLLAR PIGS.
"THANKS FOR SAVING US FROM THE SPOT O' TROUBLE BACK THERE."
THEY OFFER A SHIP, OR CRAZY SPECULATIVE STOCK.

data.name: evPigReward0Ship
data.value: ACCEPT NEW SHIP.

data.name: evPigReward0Stock
data.value: ACCEPT SPECULATIVE STOCK.

data.name: logPigRewardShip
data.value: THE PIGS THANKED ME. I CHOSE TO ACCEPT A NEW SHIP FROM THEM.

data.name: logPigRewardStock
data.value: THE PIGS THANKED ME. I CHOSE TO ACCEPT CRAZY SPECULATIVE STOCK FROM THEM.

data.name: evToucanTreasure0
data.value:
YOU FOLLOW THE TOUCANS' TREASURE MAP.
YOU FIGHT THROUGH AN UNDERWATER TEMPLE AND ARRIVE AT THE INNER SANCTUM.
THE TREASURE IS A SIGHT TO BEHOLD.

data.name: evToucanTreasure0Yay
data.value: YAY!

data.name: logToucanTreasure
data.value: I FOLLOWED THE TOUCAN TREASURE MAP. AFTER A LONG JOURNEY, WE FOUND THE TOTEM OF MECA LECA.

data.name: nameAssassin
data.value: NINA PASADENA

data.name: nameBandit
data.value: KOKO FLORES

data.name: nameCats
data.value: FUN FACTORY AND CHU-CHU

data.name: nameDeer
data.value: COL. AIRAM ATNAS

data.name: nameHitchhikers
data.value: BILLINA HENNING AND PRETZEL

data.name: nameNavOfficer
data.value: LT. MIAMI KHAN

data.name: nameCrisium
data.value: THE CRISIUM

data.name: nameHippoBuddy
data.value: PIG-EYE ROBBINS

data.name: nameHippoPirateBuddy
data.value: BIG CHEEKS

data.name: nameImplementors
data.value: THE IMPLEMENTORS

data.name: nameJaguar
data.value: CHAZ VOLTA

data.name: namePandaSlave
data.value: SHABA

data.name: namePigs
data.value: HAROULLA AND SPAROULLA

data.name: namePirates
data.value: POISON SUMAC AND ALL-BALL

data.name: nameRhino
data.value: TRIPHAMMER JACKSON

data.name: nameSlaver
data.value: MR. HORNERS CORNERS

data.name: nameSwan
data.value: AGENT SYLVIA VALDEZ

data.name: nameToucan
data.value: THURSTON AND WIGGIN

data.name: nameWeapOfficer
data.value: BIG DEAN CAVES

data.name: nameYetis
data.value: PALANKA AND GUBO

data.name: evBitterMelon0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER INTERGALACTIC ROCK BAND "BITTER MELON."
"OI. A COUPLE O' OUR PIGGY FRIENDS TOLD US YOU WERE ON THE UP AN' UP.
HELP US CURE OUR DRUMMER'S BAD CASE OF BOOTY-BATS. WE'LL PAY HANDSOMELY."

data.name: logBitterMelon
data.value: THE PIGS WE SAVED SENT US TO THE ROCK BAND BITTER MELON. THEY'RE LOOKING FOR A CURE FOR THEIR DRUMMER'S BOOTY-BATS.

data.name: evCatGunReward0
data.value:
LITTLE LION RETURNS FOR HIS STASHED GUNS.
"RIGHTEOUS ON YA. ME COUSINS WERE RIGHT ABOUT YOU.
TAKE THIS AS YOUR PAYMENT."

data.name: evCatGunReward0DamnToucans
data.value: SORRY, LITTLE LION.

data.name: evCatGunReward0Thanks
data.value: MUCH LOVE, LITTLE LION.

data.name: evCatGunReward0Toucans
data.value:
LITTLE LION RETURNS FOR HIS STASHED GUNS.
"WHAT'S THIS? WHERE BE ME GUNS?!"
YOU SEARCH FOR HOURS, BUT THE GUNS ARE NOWHERE TO BE FOUND. YOU HAVE A STRONG SUSPICION YOUR TOUCAN STOWAWAYS ARE INVOLVED.

data.name: evCatPrototype0
data.value:
YOU FIND LITTLE LION RIDDLED WITH GUNSHOTS.
"IS IT SAFE!?... TAKE THIS PROTOTYPE SHIP... AND KEEP IT SAFE!"
YOU CATCH A GLIMPSE OF AN ANATIDAEN SECRET POLICE BADGE IN HIS WALLET.

data.name: evCatPrototype0Goodnight
data.value: GOOD NIGHT, LITTLE LION.

data.name: logCatGunReward
data.value: LITTLE LION RETURNED FOR HIS GUN STASH. HE PAID ME AND LEFT WITH HIS GUNS.

data.name: logCatGunRewardToucanStole
data.value: LITTLE LION RETURNED FOR HIS GUN STASH, BUT THE GUNS WERE GONE. I SUSPECT MY TOUCAN STOWAWAYS HAD A HAND IN THIS.

data.name: logCatPrototype
data.value: I FOUND LITTLE LION RIDDLED WITH BULLETS. HE GAVE ME HIS "PROTOTYPE SHIP" AND URGED I KEEP IT SAFE.

data.name: nameCatGuns
data.value: LITTLE LION

data.name: evBitterMelonConcert0
data.value:
AFTER A CONCERT, YOU ARE ATTACKED BY BITTER MELON GROUPIES.
"ERRRR, THIS IS AWKWARD.
GROUPIES, Y'KNOW? THEY GET A BIT WILD, NO?"

data.name: evBitterMelonPanda0
data.value:
SHABA THE PANDA GROWS INCREASINGLY INFATUATED WITH BITTER MELON.
"ERRRR, PANDA, WE'RE A BIT BUSY AT THE MO'.
HERE, TAKE THIS. IT'S VERY VALUABLE. NOW PLEASE GO."

data.name: evCasinoJob0
data.value:
"TIME TO PAY UP. WE GOT A JOB FOR YOU.
HUNT DOWN SPIDER TWAIN AND TAKE HIS DIAMOND EYEBALL. EASY PEASY, NO?"

data.name: evSpiderTwain0
data.value:
"WHY I DO DECLARE, THE CASINO SENT YOU TO TAKE MY SPECTACULAR DIAMOND EYEBALL.
WHY DON'T I GIVE YOU SOME CARGO, AND YOU PRETEND YOU NEVER SEEN ME?
I SAY, I SAY, DO WE HAVE A DEAL?"

data.name: evSpiderTwain0AcceptBribe
data.value: ACCEPT BRIBE AND LEAVE.

data.name: evSpiderTwain0Fight
data.value: FIGHT SPIDER TWAIN.

data.name: logBitterMelonConcert
data.value: AFTER BITTER MELON PERFORMED AT A CONCERT, WE WERE ATTACKED BY A PACK OF WILD GROUPIES.

data.name: logBitterMelonPanda
data.value: SHABA THE PANDA BECAME INFATUATED WITH BITTER MELON. THEY GAVE SHABA SOME CARGO AND TOLD HIM TO PLEASE LEAVE.

data.name: logCasinoJob
data.value: THE CASINO WANTS ME TO HUNT DOWN AND TAKE THE DIAMOND EYEBALL OF SOMEONE NAMED "SPIDER TWAIN".

data.name: logSpiderTwainBribe
data.value: I TRACKED DOWN SPIDER TWAIN. I CHOSE TO ACCEPT HIS BRIBE AND LET HIM LEAVE.

data.name: logSpiderTwainFight
data.value: I TRACKED DOWN SPIDER TWAIN. I CHOSE TO FULFILL MY PROMISE TO THE CASINO, AND TOOK TWAIN'S DIAMOND EYE.

data.name: nameBitterMelon
data.value: BITTER MELON

data.name: nameSpiderTwain
data.value: SPIDER TWAIN

data.name: evDemoEnd0
data.value:
"HALT. YOU'VE REACHED THE END OF THIS FLOTILLA TRIAL VERSION ADVENTURE.
WHAT HAPPENS NOW? THE UNIVERSE IMPLODES."
DO YOU WANT TO UNLOCK THE FULL GAME?

data.name: logDemoEnd
data.value: I REACHED THE END OF THE FLOTILLA TRIAL VERSION ADVENTURE. AS A RESULT, THE UNIVERSE IMPLODED UPON ITSELF.

data.name: evKaraoke0
data.value:
YOU AND YOUR CREW VISIT A KARAOKE BAR. YOU SING A "BITTER MELON" SONG.
SIXTEEN CASES OF VODKAHOL LATER, YOU FIND YOURSELF DECLARED KARAOKE CHAMPION OF THE UNIVERSE.
YOU TAKE YOUR DESERVED PRIZE.

data.name: evKaraoke0Great
data.value: I DO DESERVE IT.

data.name: evPandaFight0
data.value:
YOU PASS BY A SLAVER RING. WITHOUT WARNING, SHABA THE PANDA OPENS FIRE.
"AWWW YEAAAH! COME AND GET ME, YOU SLIMY SLAVER CLOWNS!"

data.name: evSlaveFight0
data.value:
YOUR BLIND JUMP LANDS YOU IN THE MIDDLE OF A SLAVER RING. THE SLAVERS LOSE A SHIPMENT OF PANDA BEARS.
"YOU JUS' LOST US A SLEUTH OF PANDAS. TODAY AIN'T YOUR DAY, BUB."

data.name: logKaraoke
data.value: I SANG IN A KARAOKE CONTEST AND WON CARGO.

data.name: logPandaFight
data.value: WE PASSED BY A SLAVER RING. SHABA THE PANDA IMMEDIATELY OPENED FIRE AND WE CAME UNDER ATTACK.

data.name: logSlaveFight
data.value: MY BLIND JUMP DISRUPTED A SLAVE RING. THE SLAVERS OPENED FIRE.

data.name: evUnicorn0
data.value:
AFTER DAYS LOST IN THE WARP, A VISION EMERGES.
"IT'S DANGEROUS TO GO ALONE. TAKE THIS AND VANQUISH THE BRUJA."

data.name: evUnicorn0OK
data.value: ROCK ON

data.name: logUnicorn
data.value: I CHOSE TO ENTER A WORMHOLE. THE GODDESS ATENEA GAVE US AN ARTIFACT.

data.name: nameUnicorn
data.value: ATENEA

data.name: evAfrodita0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER THE GODDESS AFRODITA. SHE PLUCKS OUT YOUR EYE.
"NOW TAKE THIS GAUNTLET! STRIKE FORTH WITH YOUR ALL-SEEING EYE!"

data.name: evAfrodita0Thanks
data.value: THANK YOU...?

data.name: evCatBounty0
data.value:
"ON BEHALF OF THE CERVIDIAN EMPIRE, WE THANK YOU FOR ASSISTING THE APPREHENSION OF THOSE TWO FUGITIVE CATS. PLEASE TAKE THIS REWARD.
THOUGH ON A PERSONAL NOTE, BOTTOM DREGS LIKE YOU MAKE ME SICK.
GET A REAL JOB, PLEB."

data.name: evKoala0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A TEAR-STAINED KOALA.
"YOU FRIBBING MONSTER!
MY TWIN BROTHER "COOLER" WAS A HOSTAGE ON THAT PIRATE SHIP YOU FRIBBIN' BLEW UP.
ALL I HAVE LEFT OF HIM IS THIS DIDGERIDOO. I'M GONNA END YOU."

data.name: logAfrodita
data.value: I CHOSE TO ENTER A WORMHOLE. THE GODDESS AFRODITA PLUCKED OUT MY EYE AND GAVE ME A GAUNTLET ARTIFACT.

data.name: logCatBounty
data.value: CERVIDIAN AUTHORITIES REWARDED US FOR HELPING CAPTURE THE FUGITIVE CATS.

data.name: logKoala
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HOSTILE KOALA. HIS TWIN BROTHER WAS A HOSTAGE ON THE PIRATE SHIP I BLEW UP.

data.name: nameAfrodita
data.value: AFRODITA

data.name: nameKoala
data.value: COOLIE HERNANDEZ

data.name: logFlamingo
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CRIPPLED FLAMINGO AT A TRADING OUTPOST.

data.name: evDogs0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER THE PSYCHIC DOGS OF PUPU 7.
"YOU HAVE LOST AN EYE IN YOUR JOURNEY. SO BEGINS YOUR ROLE IN THE PROPHECY.
TAKE THIS. WHEN THE TIME COMES, YOU'LL KNOW WHAT TO DO."

data.name: evDogs0OK
data.value: SURE THING, DOGS

data.name: logDogs
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED THE PSYCHIC DOGS OF PUPU 7. THEY BELIEVE I'M PART OF A PROPHECY, AND GAVE ME AN ARTIFACT.

data.name: nameDogs
data.value: PSYCHIC DOGS

data.name: evKaraokeRevenge0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER AN OWL WARLORD.
"FAREWELL, SO-CALLED KARAOKE CHAMP. PRETENDER TO THE THRONE. BABY-PEANUT WEAK.
THERE'S ONLY ROOM FOR ONE KARAOKE CHAMP IN THIS UNIVERSE."

data.name: logKaraokeRevenge
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HOSTILE OWL WARLORD. HE SOUGHT TO RECLAIM HIS KARAOKE CHAMP TITLE FROM ME.

data.name: nameOwl
data.value: SZE IZOR

data.name: evCrocodile0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A BARKING MAD CROCODILE.
"WHAT- WHERE AM I- WHO ARE YOU?!
SHE TOLD ME I WAS GOING TO BE OKAY! THIS! IS! NOT! OKAY!"
THE CROCODILE OPENS FIRE.

data.name: evCrocodile0Friend
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A BARKING MAD CROCODILE. "WHAT- WHERE AM I- WHO ARE YOU?!"
YOUR CRISIUM SCIENTISTS DISCOVER THE CROCODILE HAS SUFFERED TERRIBLY FROM A TIME-TRAVELING EXPERIMENT GONE WRONG.
THE CROCODILE JOINS YOUR FLOTILLA.

data.name: evPenguinReunion0
data.value:
YOU ACCIDENTALLY INTERRUPT A FAMILY REUNION OF PENGUIN BANDITS. THEY OPEN FIRE.
"CAREFUL, BOJO! THIS IS PENGUIN COUNTRY!"

data.name: evPenguins0
data.value:
THE PENGUIN BANDIT OPENS FIRE.
"YOU'RE IN MY WORLD NOW, BOJO."

data.name: logCrocodile
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CONFUSED CROCODILE. THE CROCODILE OPENED FIRE ON ME.

data.name: logCrocodileFriend
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A CONFUSED TIME-TRAVELING CROCODILE. AFTER MY CRISIUM SCIENTISTS CALMED HIM DOWN, HE JOINED MY FLOTILLA.

data.name: logPenguinReunion
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A PENGUIN BANDIT FAMILY REUNION. THEY ATTACKED ME ON SIGHT.

data.name: logPenguins
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HOSTILE PENGUIN BANDIT.

data.name: nameCrocodile
data.value: LATISSIMUS DORSI

data.name: namePenguins
data.value: VENETIA FLAIR

data.name: evOwl0
data.value:
THE WARFARING OWL LAUNCHES A MISSILE BARRAGE.
"I HEARD OF YOUR EXPLOITS, CAPTAIN. AT LAST I HAVE FOUND WORTHY PREY.
LET US DIE IN HONORABLE BATTLE!"

data.name: logOwl
data.value: A WARFARING OWL ATTACKED ME WITH EXTREME PREJUDICE.

data.name: nameOwl2
data.value: AMI IZOR

data.name: evOwlBribe0
data.value:
A WARFARING OWL FIRES A WARNING SHOT.
"I DON'T TAKE KINDLY TO SLAVERS.
AND I DON'T TAKE KINDLY TO THOSE WHO ACCEPT BRIBES FROM SLAVERS."

data.name: logOwlBribe
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A HOSTILE WARFARING OWL. THE OWL WAS DISPLEASED I TOOK THE BRIBE FROM THE SLAVER.

data.name: nameOwl3
data.value: LAU FU ZI

data.name: logDestruct
data.value: MY ADVENTURE ENDED IN A FIERY BLAZE OF GLORY.

data.name: evDeerHitchhikers0
data.value:
"HALT, INCOMING FLOTILLA. WE'VE RECEIVED WORD YOU'VE HARBORED HITCHHIKERS.
UNDER CERVIDIAN EDICT MCXVII, PAY A PENALTY FEE OF ONE CARGO PIECE."

data.name: evDeerHitchhikers0NoCargo
data.value:
"APPARENTLY YOU DON'T HAVE CARGO.
DON'T WORRY. YOU'LL BE FINE TARGET PRACTICE."

data.name: logDeerHitchhikerFight
data.value: A DEER ORDERED ME TO PAY A PENALTY FOR HARBORING HITCHHIKERS. I REFUSED TO PAY.

data.name: logDeerHitchhikerPay
data.value: A DEER ORDERED ME TO PAY A PENALTY FOR HARBORING HITCHHIKERS. I CHOSE TO COMPLY.

data.name: logDeerHitchhikerPayNoCargo
data.value: A DEER ORDERED ME TO PAY A PENALTY FOR HARBORING HITCHHIKERS. I COULDN'T PAY THE FEE, SO THE DEER OPENED FIRE.

data.name: nameDeer2
data.value: COL. ANIN ATNIP

data.name: evPrisoner0StaySilentTakeCargo
evWine0
data.value:
YOUR KARAOKE FANS TAKE YOU ON A PUB CRAWL.
HOURS LATER, YOU REALIZE YOU'VE INVENTED A MIXED DRINK: "THE {0} SUCKER-PUNCH."
YOUR FAME NETS YOU AN IMPRESSIVE PRIZE.

data.name: evWine0OK
data.value: I LOVE IT

data.name: logWine
data.value: MY KARAOKE FANS TOOK ME ON A PUB CRAWL. I INVENTED A MIXED DRINK AND IT WON ME A PRIZE.

data.name: evDogBoots0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER THE PSYCHIC DOGS OF PUPU 7.
"YOU'VE MET THE IMPLEMENTORS IN A DREAM. YOU HAVE THE MARK!
TAKE THIS. IT WILL SERVE YOU WELL."

data.name: evHitchhikerGift0
data.value:
"HEY STRANGER! REMEMBER US?"
YOU BUMP INTO TWO FAMILIAR FACES. THEY HAVE SINCE BECOME WEALTHY BOARDGAME TYCOONS.
THEY GIVE YOU A TOKEN OF APPRECIATION.

data.name: evHitchhikerGift0OK
data.value: GOOD TO SEE Y'ALL

data.name: evPenguinHitman0
data.value:
YOU ENCOUNTER A PENGUIN BOUNTY HUNTER.
"THE TANGERIN CASINO SENT ME. YOU SURE KNOW HOW TO PICK YOUR ENEMIES.
YOU'RE DEAD MEAT, CHUM."

data.name: logDogBoots
data.value: THE PSYCHIC DOGS OF PUPU 7 SOMEHOW KNOW ABOUT MY IMPLEMENTORS DREAM. THE DOGS GAVE ME AN ARTIFACT.

data.name: logHitchhikerGift
data.value: I BUMPED INTO THE HITCHHIKERS. THEY'VE SINCE BECOME WEALTHY BOARDGAME DESIGNERS. THEY GAVE ME A GIFT.

data.name: logPenguinHitman
data.value: THE TANGERIN CASINO SENT A PENGUIN HITMAN TO HUNT AND DESTROY ME.

data.name: namePenguinHitman
data.value: CLIV TOMBAUGH

data.name: evBruja0
evBruja0Fail
data.value: WHEN YOU WAKE UP, YOU FIND A CURSED TATTOO BURNED ONTO YOUR CHEST.

data.name: evBruja0Gauntlet
data.value: YOU USE YOUR GAUNTLET ARTIFACT TO SMASH THE BRUJA TO PIECES.

data.name: evBruja0OK
data.value: YIKES!

data.name: logBrujaFail
data.value: THE BRUJA FOLLOWED US WHEN WE INVESTIGATED THE DERELICT. THE BRUJA BURNED A TATTOO ONTO MY CHEST AND DISAPPEARED.

data.name: logBrujaGauntlet
data.value: THE BRUJA FOLLOWED US WHEN WE INVESTIGATED THE DERELICT. I USED MY GAUNTLET ARTIFACT TO SMASH AND DESTROY THE BRUJA.

data.name: nameBruja
data.value: BRUJA

data.name: evOwlTattoo0
data.value:
"YOU BEAR THE MARK OF THE BRUJA. MAY THE IMPLEMENTORS HAVE MERCY ON YOUR SOUL.
YOUR MISERY ENDS NOW. GO LIGHTLY TOWARD THE DARKNESS, FRIEND."

data.name: logOwlTattoo
data.value: I ENCOUNTERED A WARFARING OWL. THE OWL KNEW OF MY BRUJA MARK AND WANTED TO "PUT ME OUT OF MY MISERY."

data.name: nameOwlTattoo
data.value: TARO BEAN
